backend/main.mo: Core backend actor handling user profiles, privacy settings, and admin‑managed custom domain configuration with access control enforcement.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading older state to include a new optional custom domain config while preserving user profiles and settings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of each frontend source file.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file showing how to set the site's canonical base URL for SEO and custom domains.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Documentation explaining how to configure DNS and map a custom domain to the deployed Internet Computer frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based OKLCH color theme definitions for light and dark modes with semantic UI color variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with Incognibro branding and full SEO metadata including canonical link and Open Graph tags.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt enabling all crawlers and referencing the sitemap using a placeholder domain.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Basic sitemap containing a single root URL entry with placeholder domain and metadata for search engines.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app setting up theming, navigation tabs, protection UI components, SEO metadata, and user profile onboarding.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication state, loading states, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile with validation and blocking overlay.
frontend/src/components/privacy/Blocklis: Provides UI to view, add, and remove custom blocked domains, integrating with privacy settings and authentication state.
frontend/src/components/privacy/Header.t: Renders the dashboard header with branding, login controls, and a note about the privacy dashboard’s purpose.
frontend/src/components/privacy/Protecti: Displays protection log entries and allows clearing them, showing an empty state when no activity exists.
Shows current tracker protection status and allows toggling auto-stop tracking, with authentication-aware settings.
frontend/src/components/privacy/ScanResu: Displays scan results including detected trackers and clean domains with status indicators and scrollable lists.
frontend/src/components/privacy/TrackerS: Provides UI to scan single or multiple domains for trackers, process results, and log scan activity.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Exports site configuration including base URL resolution and metadata like site name and description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useProtectionLog.ts: Manages a localStorage‑backed log of protection events with add and clear functions, keeping up to 100 entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, privacy settings, and blocklist data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and color variables for light/dark themes, including custom utility classes for status colors.
frontend/src/lib/domainParsing.ts: Parses and normalizes domain input into validated domain entries, returning errors for invalid or unparsable lines.
frontend/src/lib/trackerBlocklist.ts: Provides default tracker domains, normalization utilities, and functions to detect tracker domains and merge blocklists.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/seo/useSeoMetadata.ts: Updates document title, description, and canonical URL based on provided SEO metadata options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters plus persisting them in sessionStorage, including utilities to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, versioning, requirements, known issues, and features for the Incognibro privacy dashboard app.
